column1: What is the best website to watch the 7 day rolling positive Covid percentage.?

-:- Message from Tripadvisor staff -:-This post has been removed at the author's request. The author may repost if desired.Posts on the Tripadvisor forums may be edited for a short period of time. Once the edit period has expired, authors may update their posts by removing and reposting them.To read more about editing your posts, please follow this link: http://www.tripadvisor.com/help/how_to_edit_your_postsRemoved on: 12:43 am, July 10, 2020

This is the most up to date site in terms of raw data for the country and per state, although they don't have your specific request. The do have it per region. (Southwest US is currently at 13.9% 7DA.)https://covidtracking.com/data
Go to the first link Chuck posted.Scroll down a little to the "Powerpoint" style display.Go to Page 8.The orange line is the 7 day average of Test Positivity Rate.
